name: HackMePlease
description:
In this game you will have to hack the terminals!
And you can also find Easter eggs!

this is the first game from Riot games, we love our profession 
very much and we are ready to make more games!

In the meantime, you can subscribe to our group in VK
Group: https://vk.com/hot_games_studios

And we will also be very grateful if you donate to us for development :)
